snippet: Alain Renaud will take over as global head of mergers and acquisitions at HSBC after Andrew Bell left the European firm to join the American investment bank Jefferies.
abstract: Alain Renaud will take over as global head of mergers and acquisitions at HSBC after Andrew Bell left the European firm to join the American investment bank Jefferies.

headline.main: HSBC Taps New Head of Global M.&A.
